title: [Bugsplat] Kog Maw Passive Bugsplats Game?
body:
I was in a custom (tournament,) and I was Janna. Everytime Kog Maw died and his passive blew up, he would bugsplat my client. Anyone else?

Recreating:

Have Kog Maw on your team.

Have him die and use passive.

Splat. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Edit: It does not seem to work if YOU are the Kog Maw, only others.

replies.body:
Hey VenturaThePoro! 

Would you be able to grab me your r3dlogs for this game?

You can find the files here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs

Each file appears like this: [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FAsowQBi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-22T21:15:10.186+0000)
>
> Hey VenturaThePoro! 
> 
> Would you be able to grab me your r3dlogs for this game?
> 
> You can find the files here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs
> 
> Each file appears like this: [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

Here ya go! I have no idea which one was the one with the Kog Maw cause I played several times before that, so I just put like 10 to be sure >_< 

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/5o7j4v4e65ag9tc/AABcP6L9ERgyRZZ5-ZicNeDOa?dl=0

I think this is the whole folder. If I'm missing a few let me know. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
**EDIT**: We aren't able to repro this. D: It's possible some files may have been jumbled. Would you mind doing a client repair? Once that's done, we can check if it's still occurring.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FAsowQBi,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-02-23T21:12:56.216+0000)
>
> **EDIT**: We aren't able to repro this. D: It's possible some files may have been jumbled. Would you mind doing a client repair? Once that's done, we can check if it's still occurring.

Oh welp :P I'll try a client repair, I've been having trouble with my drivers so it MIGHT be that too. I'll get back to you once I repair and test it c:
Ahh, gotcha! Yeah, try giving your client and drivers an update, and lemme know how that works out!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FAsowQBi,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-23T22:19:46.193+0000)
>
> Ahh, gotcha! Yeah, try giving your client and drivers an update, and lemme know how that works out!

At this point I'm pretty sure my drivers are just malfunctioning, I might need to purchase new ones. It seems that everyone who hasn't updated their drivers gets the Kog'Maw bugsplat issue though, so maybe yall should tell everyone to update asap so it doesn't happen :o
It could be an instance with a specific driver - I can talk to Champion to have them dig a bit deeper. I checked on my machine - my drivers aren't all up to date, and I'm not having this issue. :c

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FAsowQBi,comment-id=00000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-24T17:25:45.124+0000)
>
> It could be an instance with a specific driver - I can talk to Champion to have them dig a bit deeper. I checked on my machine - my drivers aren't all up to date, and I'm not having this issue. :c

Hm, maybe! It could also be Windows 10 compatibility with the driver, I have a Nvidia GeForce GT 730 with the specific driver for that graphics card. :o

I'm still scared to update myself. :c 

This is wicked weird. I'm poking around, but no repro on my end. D:

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FAsowQBi,comment-id=0000000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-24T20:20:38.359+0000)
>
> I'm still scared to update myself. :c 
> 
> This is wicked weird. I'm poking around, but no repro on my end. D:

Yeah, I guess it's a really specific problem with specific errors and such? I have no idea >_< other people seem to get it but it doesn't seem to affect a lot of people, only a few... I wonder why. :o

Edit: He was using the Sonoran Kog'Maw skin, maybe that's the issue???
i have the same i tested on bot game

> [{quoted}](name=Malliodd,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FAsowQBi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-22T22:13:44.711+0000)
>
> i have the same i tested on bot game

It seems to not work when you ARE a Kog Maw, but if you're an ally of a Kog Maw from what I've seen personally... no idea why.

> [{quoted}](name=SwHc Fenris,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=FAsowQBi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-23T21:48:40.891+0000)
>
> It's actually a part of Kog'Maw's passive....
> Damn it, I can't come up with a Kog'Maw passive being a bugsplat as in ''kog is the bug and his passive makes him splat'' Joke :[
> {{summoner:31}}

lol, it's cool me got the pun c:
My game just says {{champion:96}} is missing from the game and it crashes me in the loading screen and doesn't even let me in
